commented_code:
+metadata:
+  name: "Ensure no open CORS policy"
+  id: "CKV2_AWS_75"
+  category: "NETWORKING"
+scope:
+  provider: "aws"
+definition:
+  and:
+    - cond_type: "filter"
+      attribute: "resource_type"
+      value:
+        - "AWS::Lambda::Url"
